name: angeleno
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US city of Los Angeles: It's so nice to meet another Angeleno! The restaurant was popular among young Angelenos.
More examplesFewer examplesThe real Angeleno would not deign to notice a star.How does such a cold city come to feel like home to a native Angeleno?He says that the governor, as an Angeleno, understands the needs of the city and has treated it well.As an author, he gave voice to a uniquely Angeleno worldview.
